flawed_nl_solution:
The canvases cost $40 and she spent half that amount on paint so she spent 40/2 = $<<40/2=20>>20 on paint
She spent $40 on canvases, $20 on paint and $15 on an easel so she spent 40+20+15 = $<<40+20+15=75>>75
She spent $90 total and her other purchases totaled $75 so she spent 90-75 = $<<90-75=51>>51 on paint brushes
#### 51

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 51. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
